message: Mastne said that on one level, “Imago” looks at human trafficking on the surface. But it also involves going deeper in exploring redemption of the characters, he said. “For most of the girls who’ve been either tricked or kidnapped, it’s physical and literal redemption (when they’re freed),”

data.description: RANDALL — In the bright sun, three women have been crowded into and are hidden inside the bed of a large pickup truck that has pulled into the vast sandpit
data.title: Movie being filmed in Kenosha County looks to bring human trafficking to the fore
